original: @46b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @46b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sh'u n+ya t'a k'a ru na drishthi n'a ma /
analyzed: sh'u n+ya t'a k'a ru na drishthi n'a ma /
translated: Śūnyatākāruṇadṛṣṭi-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: stong nyid snying rje'i lta ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: stong nyid snying rje'i lta ba zhes bya ba /
translated: The View of Emptiness and Compassion

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta.🔽From the perspective of examining and observing

original: mi gtsang ba yi srid pa dang // 'jig rten pa yi spyod pa dang // rnam pas dpyad cing bltas bas na //
analyzed: mi gtsang ba yi srid pa dang // 'jig rten pa yi spyod pa dang // rnam pas dpyad cing bltas bas na //
translated: Impure existence and worldly conduct,

original: dngos po stong pa nyid du snang //🔽kye ma snying rje da ma ru //
analyzed: dngos po stong pa nyid du snang // kye ma snying rje da ma ru //
translated: Things appear as emptiness.🔽Alas, the sound of compassion's damaru

original: sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshar che //
translated: Is truly amazing!

original: a'arya de ba dmigs med pa'i //
analyzed: a'arya de ba dmigs med pa'i //
translated: Āryadeva, who is free from reference points,

original: rgyal bo'i srid la ngoms pa med //
analyzed: rgyal bo'i srid la ngoms pa med //
translated: Is never satisfied with the kingdom of the Victorious Ones.🔽Where there is no mind, no wind,

original: gang du yid dang rlung dag dang // dbang po gnas pa yod min na //
analyzed: gang du yid dang rlung dag dang // dbang po gnas pa yod min na //
translated: And no abiding of the senses,🔽I do not know where I go

original: bdag ni gang du 'gro ba dang // gang du gnas pa ma shes so //🔽kye ma snying rje da ma ru //
analyzed: bdag ni gang du 'gro ba dang // gang du gnas pa ma shes so // kye ma snying rje da ma ru //
translated: Or where I stay.🔽Alas, the sound of compassion's damaru

original: sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshar che //
translated: Is truly amazing!

original: a'arya de ba dmigs med pa'i //
analyzed: a'arya de ba dmigs med pa'i //
translated: Āryadeva, who is free from reference points,

original: rgyal po'i srid la ngoms pa med //
analyzed: rgyal po'i srid la ngoms pa med //
translated: Is never satisfied with the kingdom of the Victorious Ones.

original: zla ba las ni zla ba yi //
analyzed: zla ba las ni zla ba yi //
translated: From the moon, the moon's

original: 'od zer yongs su gsal bar 'byung //
analyzed: 'od zer yongs su gsal bar 'byung //
translated: rays shine forth in all their brilliance.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni //
translated: The innate nature

original: de nyid du ni 'jug par 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid du ni 'jug par 'gyur //
translated: is engaged in just that.

original: kye ma snying rje da ma ru //
analyzed: kye ma snying rje da ma ru //
translated: Oh, the wonder of the compassion drum,

original: sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshar che //🔽a'arya de ba dmigs med pa'i //
analyzed: sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshar che // a'arya de ba dmigs med pa'i //
translated: which resounds with such amazement!🔽Aryadeva, the king of non-apprehension,

original: rgyal po'i srid la ngoms ba med //
analyzed: rgyal po'i srid la ngoms ba med //
translated: is insatiable with royal power.

original: a'arya de ba thams cad spyang //
analyzed: a'arya de ba thams cad spyang //
translated: Aryadeva, having cleared away everything,

original: spyang pas rang bzhin dmigs med 'gyur //
analyzed: spyang pas rang bzhin dmigs med 'gyur //
translated: the clear one becomes free from apprehension.

original: kye ma snying rje da ma ru //
analyzed: kye ma snying rje da ma ru //
translated: Oh, the wonder of the compassion drum,

original: sgra sgrogs ba ni ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: sgra sgrogs ba ni ngo mtshar che //
translated: which resounds with such amazement!

original: a'arya de ba dmigs med pa'i //
analyzed: a'arya de ba dmigs med pa'i //
translated: Aryadeva, the king of non-apprehension,

original: rgyal po'i srid la ngoms pa med //
analyzed: rgyal po'i srid la ngoms pa med //
translated: is insatiable with royal power.

original: stong nyid snying rje'i lta ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po a'arya de ba nas brgyud pa slob dpon tsa ta bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: stong nyid snying rje'i lta ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po a'arya de ba nas brgyud pa slob dpon tsa ta bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The view of emptiness and compassion, composed by the master Catra, is completed.
